data<-iris

#a)individually for each feature


#mean
features.mean<-apply(data[1:4],2,mean)
features.mean  

#sd
features.sd<-apply(data[1:4],2,sd)
features.sd

#b)individually for each feature for each flower type

#calculating mean
flower.sepal_length.mean<-tapply(data$Sepal.Length,data$Species,mean)
flower.sepal_length.mean
flower.sepal_width.mean<-tapply(data$Sepal.Width,data$Species,mean)
flower.sepal_width.mean
flower.Petal_Length.mean<-tapply(data$Petal.Length,data$Species,mean)
flower.Petal_Length.mean  
flower.Petal_width.mean<-tapply(data$Petal.Width,data$Species,mean)
flower.Petal_width.mean

#calculating sd
flower.sepal_length.sd<-tapply(data$Sepal.Length,data$Species,sd)
flower.sepal_length.sd
flower.sepal_width.sd<-tapply(data$Sepal.Width,data$Species,sd)
flower.sepal_width.mean
flower.Petal_Length.sd<-tapply(data$Petal.Length,data$Species,sd)
flower.Petal_Length.sd  
flower.Petal_width.sd<-tapply(data$Petal.Width,data$Species,sd)
flower.Petal_width.sd

#c) Boxplot for each feature for each flower
library(ggplot2)

#Sepal.Length
g<-ggplot(data,aes(x=data$Species,y=data$Sepal.Length))
g<-g+labs(x="Species", y="Sepal.Length", title="Sepal.Length Vs Species")
g<-g+geom_boxplot(fill="darkseagreen4")
g

#Sepal.Width
g<-ggplot(data,aes(x=data$Species,y=data$Sepal.Width))
g<-g+labs(x="Species", y="Sepal.Width", title="Sepal.Width Vs Species")
g<-g+geom_boxplot(fill="darkseagreen4")
g

g
